EmailTemplate.name: Tour Cancel Followup - Opportunity2
EmailTemplate.subject: Want to schedule a tour with WeWork?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
www.wework.com
http://facebook.com/wework
http://twitter.com/wework
http://instagram.com/wework
http://www.pinterest.com/wework
Hi there!
Looks like you canceled your tour. We would love to see you some other time. Would you like to schedule another tour with us?
Yes:https://welcome.wework.com/forms/schedulenewtour.php?oppId={!Tour_Outcome__c.OpportunityId__c}
No:https://welcome.wework.com/forms/notinterested.php?oppId={!Tour_Outcome__c.OpportunityId__c}
VALERIE BATISTA Director of Sales joinus@wework.com 855.593.9675
